messages.subject: about thinking and clarity and writing
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I don t think I took time to think about what I was writing-=- First think.  Sometimes you won t even need to write.  Sometimes write.  Sometimes you
messages.messageBody:
-=-I don't think I took time to think about what I was writing-=-

First think. Sometimes you won't even need to write. <g>
Sometimes write. Sometimes you won't even need to post it in public.

I'm not trying to discourage you from posting at all. Post away!
But if you admit you posted something you hadn't thought about,
you're putting carts before horses.
======================================================================
I wrote the second part in January 2006. It popped up for some other
reason but seems applicable to the past day or two here.

I'm not trying to be mean when I ask people to read carefully and
post thoughtfully.

Sandra





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
